description: Gather all the tools required for tea preparation.
name: Gather tools
pseudocode: Collect necessary items such as teapot, teacups, kettle, tea leaves/bags, water, and any additional desired items (e.g., sugar, milk).

description: Assemble the tools required for tea preparation.
name: Prepare tools
pseudocode: Arrange the gathered tools in the area where the tea will be made. Ensure all items are clean and ready for use.
